thread.title: JURUPA VALLEY: Town Hall meeting set
thread.title_full: JURUPA VALLEY: Town Hall meeting set - Press Enterprise

author: The Press-Enterprise
title: JURUPA VALLEY: Town Hall meeting set
text:
STAFF WRITER
Published: Oct. 20, 2015 9:55 a.m. JURUPA VALLEY: Town Hall meeting set Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT Related article Â» After taking a summer hiatus, the city of Jurupa Valley will once again begin holding town hall meetings for residents.
On Tuesday, Oct. 27 a town hall meeting will be held at Patriot High School from 6 p.m. to 8 p.m.
Residents are invited to share their thoughts with city couincil members and ask questions about what is happening in the city.
Patriot High School is at 4355 Camino Real in Jurupa Valley.
Information: 951-332-6464.
Contact the writer: 951-368-9647 or sstokley@pe.com
